text: Turf Moor is a football stadium in Burnley, Lancashire, England. It is the home ground of Premier League club Burnley Football Club, who have played there since moving from its Calder Vale ground in 1883. The stadiumis on Harry Potts Way. The road is named after the club's longest serving manager. The official capacity is 21,944. ==References== ;General * * ;Specific == Other websites == * *Stadium Guide Article Category:Football stadiums in England Category:Buildings and structures in Lancashire
title: Turf Moor
